thread.title: BRIEF-China's Ledman Optoelectonic gets regulatory approval to acquire assets

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-China's Ledman Optoelectonic gets regulatory approval to acquire assets
text:
Oct 8 Ledman Optoelectronic Co Ltd
* Says gets regulatory approval for assets acquisition, shares to resume trade on Oct 9
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1L150f2
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
